title: Creating a reading list on multimodal entailment involves selecting articles that cover various aspects of the topic, including foundational theories, methodologies, and applications. Hereâ€™s a list of 20 articles up to 2021 that you might find useful
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** by Hao-Ting Chang et al
- This paper provides a comprehensive survey of multimodal machine learning, which is foundational for understanding multimodal entailment
**"Visual and Linguistic Semantic Integration in Multimodal Neural Networks"** by Vicente Ordonez et al
- Discusses the integration of visual and linguistic data, crucial for entailment tasks
**"Deep Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"** by Peng Zhou et al
- Offers insights into deep learning approaches for multimodal data, relevant for entailment
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"** by Soujanya Poria et al
note: - While focused on sentiment analysis, it provides methodologies applicable to entailment.

title: **"Learning Deep Representations for Grounded Multimodal Semantics"** by Ronghang Hu et al
- Explores deep learning techniques for multimodal semantics
- Early work on integrating visual and textual data in language models
**"Visual Entailment: A Novel Task for Fine-Grained Image Understanding"** by Licheng Yu et al
- Introduces the task of visual entailment, directly relevant to your interest
**"Multimodal Fusion for Video Search Reranking"** by Dong Liu et al
- Discusses fusion techniques that can be applied to entailment
**"Multimodal Deep Learning"** by Ngiam Jiquan et al
note: - A foundational paper on deep learning for multimodal data.

title: **"Aligning Books and Movies: Towards Story-like Visual Explanations by Watching Movies and Reading Books"** by Yukun Zhu et al
note: - Explores alignment techniques useful for entailment.

title: **"Multimodal Learning with Deep Boltzmann Machines"** by Nitish Srivastava and Ruslan Salakhutdinov
- Discusses a model for learning from multimodal data
**"Visual Question Answering: Datasets, Algorithms, and Challenges"** by Aishwarya Agrawal et al
note: - While focused on VQA, it provides insights into multimodal reasoning.

title: **"Multimodal Transformer for Unaligned Multimodal Language Sequences"** by Yao-Hung Hubert Tsai et al
- Introduces a transformer model for multimodal data
**"Image-Text Entailment via Image Retrieval"** by Licheng Yu et al
note: - Focuses on entailment using image-text pairs.

title: **"Multimodal Representation Learning: A Review"** by Hao Zhang et al
- Reviews various approaches to multimodal representation learning
**"Multimodal Fusion: A Hybrid Approach Using Deep Learning and Feature Selection"** by Amir Zadeh et al
- Discusses fusion techniques applicable to entailment
**"Visual and Textual Sentiment Analysis through Hierarchical Deep Learning Networks"** by Amir Zadeh et al
- Explores hierarchical models for sentiment analysis, relevant for entailment
**"Multimodal Language Analysis in the Wild: CMU-MOSEI Dataset and Interpretable Dynamic Fusion Graph"** by Amir Zadeh et al
- Introduces a dataset and model for multimodal language analysis
**"Multimodal Machine Translation with Embedding Prediction"** by Desmond Elliott and Stella Frank
note: - Discusses translation techniques that can be adapted for entailment.

title: **"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis with Word-Level Fusion and Reinforcement Learning"** by Amir Zadeh et al
- Combines fusion and reinforcement learning for sentiment analysis, applicable to entailment

These articles cover a range of topics from foundational theories to specific applications and methodologies in multimodal entailment. They should provide a solid foundation for understanding the field
